Encourages the dog playfully during the car trouble.

Remains calm and uses humor and quick thinking to handle the escalating situation with the attacker and the car.

Appears disheveled, suggesting possible neglect of self-care or responsibility.

Cooing like a pigeon on the roof, demonstrating unconventional but focused behavior related to pet detection.

Uses humor and coyness when discussing his expertise and the case.
